isValidOs

protected boolean isValidOs()
Automatically approve Unix OS's.

Overrides:
isValidOs in class ExecTask
Returns:
boolean
  • true if the os under which ant is running is matches one os in the os attribute or if the os attribute is null
  • false otherwise.
